title: ennaaLLu
sahitya:
ennALLU tirugudunu I janmamettinE



anupallavi



 pannagAbharaNa shiva bAlasubramaNyA patita pAvanA nIdu pAda darshanamulakE



caraNam



 vEda shAstra jnAna vivaramulerugaka viSaya vAridhilO paDivE saridigAka

 AdhAramutOnu ninnarcimbalEnu shrI harikEshapura vAsayani sadA pogaDaga
